slide.title: ICU Locales
slide.subtitle: Example
slide.example:
<?php
$coll = new Collator("fr_CA");
if ($coll->compare("côte", "coté") < 0) {
	echo "less\n";
} else {
	echo "greater\n";
}
?>

<?php
$coll = new Collator("fr_CA");
$coll->setStrength(Collator::PRIMARY);
if ($coll->compare("côte", "cOTé") == 0) {
	echo "same\n";
} else {
	echo "different\n";
}
?>
